Let's Connect

Contact Brooke

Ready to start your musical journey? Fill out the registration form below and I'll be in touch to set up your first free trial lesson!

Only your first name and email are required, but the more you share, the better — Brooke uses this info to design a personalized lesson plan just for you.

Brooke's Lessons

Private online guitar, voice, and ukulele lessons for all ages. Based in the DFW metroplex, teaching students everywhere online.
